original_text: To restrict pollen tube growth to a single focal plane is an important subject to enable their accurate growth analysis under microscopic observation. In the conventional method to assay pollen tube growth, the pollen tubes grow in a disorderly manner on solid medium, rendering it impossible to observe their growth in detail. Here, we present a new method to assay pollen tube growth using poly-dimethylsiloxane microchannel device to isolate individual pollen tubes. The growth of the pollen tube is confined to the microchannel and to the same focal plane, allowing accurate microscopic observations. This methodology has the potential for analyses of pollen tube growth in microfluidic environments in response to chemical products and signaling molecules, which paves the way for various experiments on plant reproduction.
original_translation: Restringir el crecimiento del tubo polínico a un solo plano focal es un tema importante para permitir su análisis de crecimiento preciso bajo observación microscópica. En el método convencional para evaluar el crecimiento del tubo polínico, los tubos polínicos crecen de manera desordenada en un medio sólido, lo que hace imposible observar su crecimiento en detalle. Aquí presentamos un nuevo método para evaluar el crecimiento del tubo polínico utilizando un dispositivo de microcanales de poli-dimetilsiloxano para aislar tubos polínicos individuales. El crecimiento del tubo polínico está limitado al microcanal y al mismo plano focal, lo que permite observaciones microscópicas precisas. Esta metodología tiene el potencial para analizar el crecimiento del tubo polínico en entornos microfluídicos en respuesta a productos químicos y moléculas señalizadoras, lo que allana el camino para varios experimentos sobre la reproducción de plantas.
original_sentences: To restrict pollen tube growth to a single focal plane is an important subject to enable their accurate growth analysis under microscopic observation.
In the conventional method to assay pollen tube growth, the pollen tubes grow in a disorderly manner on solid medium, rendering it impossible to observe their growth in detail.
Here, we present a new method to assay pollen tube growth using poly-dimethylsiloxane microchannel device to isolate individual pollen tubes.
The growth of the pollen tube is confined to the microchannel and to the same focal plane, allowing accurate microscopic observations.

This methodology has the potential for analyses of pollen tube growth in microfluidic environments in response to chemical products and signaling molecules, which paves the way for various experiments on plant reproduction.

Esta metodología tiene el potencial para analizar el crecimiento del tubo polínico en entornos microfluídicos en respuesta a productos químicos y moléculas señalizadoras, lo que allana el camino para varios experimentos sobre la
reproducción de plantas
.

original_annotated_sentences:
To restrict
pollen tube
growth to a single focal plane is an important subject to enable their accurate growth analysis under microscopic observation.

In the conventional method to assay
pollen tube
growth, the pollen tubes grow in a disorderly manner on solid medium, rendering it impossible to observe their growth in detail.

Here, we present a new method to assay
pollen tube
growth using poly-dimethylsiloxane microchannel device to isolate individual pollen tubes.

The growth of the
pollen tube
is confined to the microchannel and to the same focal plane, allowing accurate microscopic observations.

This methodology has the potential for analyses of
pollen tube
growth in microfluidic environments in response to chemical products and signaling molecules, which paves the way for various experiments on plant reproduction.

original_annotated_sentences:
To
restrict pollen tube growth to a single focal plane
is an important subject to enable their accurate growth analysis under microscopic observation.
In the conventional method to assay pollen tube growth, the pollen tubes grow in a disorderly manner on solid medium, rendering it impossible to observe their growth in detail.
Here, we present a new method to assay pollen tube growth using poly-dimethylsiloxane microchannel device to isolate individual pollen tubes.
The growth of the pollen tube is confined to the microchannel and to the same focal plane, allowing accurate microscopic observations.

This methodology has the potential for analyses of pollen tube growth in microfluidic environments in response to chemical products and signaling molecules, which paves the way for various experiments on plant reproduction.
